document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic review of the Oriental Laccophilus javanicus species group (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A taxonomic review of the Oriental Laccophilus javanicus species group (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Regimbart M
bibRefCitation.refString: Regimbart M (1899) Revision des Dytiscidae de la region Indo- Sino-Malaise. Annales de la Societe Entomologique de France, 68: 186 - 367.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Indes orientales: mont Kodeikanel, aux environs de Madras [= India , Tamil Nadu State , Kodaikanal ]
.

Material examined.
229 specimens .
INDIA : Tamil Nadu
:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. A species occurring in southern India ( Karnataka and Tamil Nadu states) ( Fig. 41 ), the single record from southern Myanmar ( Guignot, 1954 ) most probably belongs to another species, e.g.,
Laccophilus hendrichi
.
